text: Carol I of Romania, original name Prince Karl Eitel Friedrich Zephyrinus Ludwig of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen, later simply of Hohenzollern (20 April 1839 - ), German prince, was elected Domnitor (Prince) of Romania on 20 April 1866, following the overthrow of Alexandru Ioan Cuza. He reigned in 1881 in the aftermath of the Russo-Turkish War of 1877â€“1878 . He died in October 1914 during World War 1 just after Austria-Hungary and Germany declared war on Serbia , Russia and France in August 1914 ==Relatives== == References == ==Other websites== * Online edition of Carol's 1899 book Reminiscences of the King of Roumania Category:1839 births Category:1914 deaths Category:German nobility Category:Roman Catholics Category:Kings of Romania
title: Carol I of Romania
